response.name: TrueLayer Transaction Format

request.description: Returns the estimated 12 month monetary value for the loyalty points specified by point_type (e.g., Nectar) using transactions from the previous month.
Returns the estimated 12 month monetary value for the loyalty points specified by point_type (e.g., Nectar) using transactions from the previous month.

Provide a list of groups and categories to be returned as a breakdown of spending, along with all sources of income. If no groups are specified by the client, return the Bud default standar of most commonly used categories and groups.

The header parameters X-From and X-To allow you to filter the result to a specified datetime range.
